data: flat desk | small room | Felix Grig's establishment | Clifford Street | Bond Street

Lilian, in dark blue office frock with an embroidered red line round the neck and detachable black wristlets that preserved the ends of the sleeves from dust and friction, sat idle at her flat desk in what was called “the small room” at Felix Grig’s establishment in Clifford Street, off Bond Street.
